The offender is likely a male in his late 20s to early 40s with antisocial traits.
He has a high need for power and control and expresses anger through escalating violence.
He targets vulnerable young women and sexually assaults them before murdering and dismembering them.
He disposes of the bodies in remote areas along Highway 38 and may keep trophies.
He likely has some knowledge of anatomy and is comfortable using weapons.
He is becoming bolder, and the frequency of his crimes is increasing.
